legend.span: Mareez ko kis qism ka TB hai

label.span: Kitney mahiney se ilaaj jari hai

label.data-items-path: instance('regimen')/root/item[( (name = 'rhzes' or name = 'rhze') and /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/treatment_phase = 'intensive' ) or ( (name = 'rhe' or name = 'rh') and /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/treatment_phase = 'continuation' ) or name = 'other']

label.span: Maximum 20 digits and cannot contain anything other than number
Must be at least a year old and less than 150 years of age

legend.span: Kya aapne HIV ka test pishley 6 mahino mein karwaya hai?
Have you had an HIV test in the past?

label.span: If yes, what is your HIV status?
Phone number 11 hindason par mushtamil aur mundarja zail shakal main hona chahiey: 03*********
Phone number should be 11 digits in the following format: 03*********

legend.span: Agli Tareeq 30 din baad deni hai?

input.name: /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/smear_due_date
input.data-calculate: if( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/category = 'cat i', ( if( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/month = 5, format-date(date( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/treatment_initiation_date + 144),'%Y-%m-%d'), if( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/month = 6, format-date(date( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/treatment_initiation_date + 174),'%Y-%m-%d'), 'not due at the moment') ) ), ( if( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/month = 3, format-date(date( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/treatment_initiation_date + 84),'%Y-%m-%d'), if( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/month = 5, format-date(date( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/treatment_initiation_date + 144),'%Y-%m-%d'), if( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/month = 8, format-date(date( /Add_InTreatment_Pt_11.01.18/diagnosis/treatment_initiation_date + 204),'%Y-%m-%d'), 'not due at the moment') ) ) ) )
